content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at Position (x=1.5, y=23.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- PipeGroup (steam) connecting the boiler and steam engine, starting at Position (x=3.5, y=17.5)
- PipeGroup (water) connecting the offshore pump and boiler, starting at Position (x=-9.5, y=23.5)
- ElectricityGroup with poles distributed across various positions, providing voltage to connected entities

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Entities
- Ensure that all entities are correctly aligned and positioned to connect with each other. Verify that the connection points are accessible and that the entities are compatible for connection.

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
